title: SPACE AND COMFORT.
posting_body: ['Parks at Treepoint', '6601 Treepoint Drive, Arlington, TX, 76017', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 12', 'OR Text', '12', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'WELCOME HOME!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 659 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Shaded by tall trees in a park-like setting, Parks at Treepoint provides a beautiful setting in a terrific location.', 'Tucked in the southwestern corner of Arlington, Parks at Treepoint is convenient to I-20, Downtown Arlington, Downtown Fort Worth, and Downtown Dallas.', 'Come see our renovated apartment homes and updated amenities!', 'This ideal Metroplex location puts you near it all - but still provides a quiet place to call home.', 'Features', '- Pool view*', '- Modern Interior Paint Finishes', '- Washer/Dryer Hookup*', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring*', '- Large Closets', '- DR - Washer & Dryer*', '- Designer Lighting', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package', '- Disposal*', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- 2 Inch Blinds', '- Upgraded Hardware', '*', 'In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Lounge Areas', '- Leash- Free Dog Park', '- Fitness Studio', '- Covered Parking', '- Courtyard', '- Outdoor Kitchen', '- Pool Area Lounge Seating', '- Clubhouse', '- New Convenient Online Payments', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Package Receiving', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 75', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $25', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is an $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet and $300 pet fee per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 75 pounds per pet, aggressive breeds are prohibited (Akitas, Chows, Dobermans, German Shepards, Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Rottweiler, Siverian Huskies and Wolf Hybrids or any mixes of these breeds.)', 'Picture of pets and proof vaccines must be provided.', 'Please call our Leasing Center for complete Pet Policy information.', 'h4OWad2a']
